sense.def:
A niche
je vdolbina v steni ali naravna vdolbina v pečini.

seg.quote: ...the little statue of the saint in his niche near the pulpit.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
has found one's niche in life
, je našel službo ali položaj, ki je kot nalašč zanj.

cit.quote: kar je nekomu pisano na kožo, prostor pod soncem

seg.quote: You can then find your own niche in public life.
